mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Wonderful Feeling", "Whicha-Way-Deygo", and "Illegitimate Chain". ROUND DANCES "Man with the Mandolino", and "Rosy Two-Step". SPECIAL FEATURES "Teaching the Young 'Uns", "Morrocan Dance Diary", "A Problem and An Answer", "The Premium Story", "The National's Getting Closer", and "Cotton Carnival". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "From the Floor", "As I See It", "The Square Dance Picture", "Help for Your Square Dance Club: A Theme for a Party", "Chuck Jones' Note Book", "Style Series: Out and In", "Paging the Roundancers: Bertha and Manfred Holck", "Square of the Month: Bill Muench", "Round the Outside Ring", and "Calendar of Square Dance Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
